doc.after: Longford Park is the largest park in Trafford, at 54 acres (22Â ha).[83] It includes a pets' corner, botanical garden, bowling greens, children's play areas, and an athletics stadium, and is the finishing point of the annual Stretford Pageant. As the ManchesterâStretford boundary ran across the park until a Boundary Commission in the 1990s, part of it [including the Athletics Stadium] was in Chorlton-cum-Hardy, although it was always administered by Trafford MBC.
